ygData.subject: Re: Magic gloves
ygData.msgSnippet: I just got done hunting in the sewer.  I got 2 sets of gloves, 2 pants, 3 shirts, 3 bracers, and a necklace (all netted) in 2 nights (6 hours playing time).
ygData.messageBody:
I just got done hunting in the sewer. I got 2 sets of gloves, 2 pants, 3
shirts, 3 bracers, and a necklace (all netted) in 2 nights (6 hours playing
time). As far as I can tell, no merchants (in Qeynos) carry this stuff as
ppl generally either horde it or sell it directly to other players.
-----Original Message-----
From: Uraence@... <Uraence@...>
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, June 04, 1999 1:14 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Magic gloves


>From: Uraence@...
>
>Depending on your level you could go kill froglocks in the sewer and get a
>set of netted off of them. I dont know how long it would take to get a
pair
>of gloves off them as the loot spawn is random, but they are found on
>Froglocks. I also don't know what they sell for in Queyons as I'm from the
>Freeport area and I run to Guk for netted, woven and mesh armor. A glove
of
>any of those will work as a magic glove.
>
>Synjyn
>19th Circle
>Erollisi Marr
>
